title: Trinity Seven OVA
alternative_title: Trinity Seven: Nanatsu no Taizai to Nana Madoushi, トリニティセブン 七つの大罪と七魔道士
description: Bundled with limited edition of the 11th compiled volume of the manga. The premise of the OVA will be written by Kenji Saitou and will deal with a "hilarious festival." The 11th volume is scheduled to be shipped on March 25th.
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> Ecchi>, <Genre -> Fantasy>, <Genre -> Harem>, <Genre -> Magic>, <Genre -> Romance>, <Genre -> School>, <Genre -> Supernatural>]
